personal.name: Mahmoud Essam
personal.title: Machine Learning Engineer
personal.bio: Machine Learning Engineer with strong expertise in computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), and applied AI research. Experienced in building end-to-end, production-ready machine learning systems supported by solid foundations in statistics, probability, and optimization.

about.summary: Machine Learning Engineer with strong expertise in computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), and applied AI research. Experienced in building end-to-end, production-ready machine learning systems. Hands-on experience applying MLOps practices to deploy, monitor, and continuously improve AI solutions in real-world environments. BSc in Data Science from Alexandria University with CGPA: 3.82/4.00.

highlights.title: MLOps & Deployment
highlights.description: Production-ready ML systems with Docker & MLflow

highlights.title: Computer Vision
highlights.description: Medical imaging and video content analysis

experience.description: Engineering end-to-end AI solutions within the ATSO team, translating complex business requirements into scalable, production-ready software. Architecting advanced agentic workflows using LangChain (LangGraph) and Dify. Building and orchestrating robust automation tools using n8n, integrating various AI models to streamline workflows and reduce operational bottlenecks.

Collaborated with the ATSO team to design and deliver an end-to-end AI software application. Developed and deployed a Bayesian ML model to detect bots and frustrated users, and built an LLM-based recommender system. Automated workflows and API endpoint integrations using n8n. Utilized Docker for containerization and deployment.

Designed and optimized PCBs (Arduino Shield, ESP32-based) with LCDs, buzzers, RFID, fingerprint readers, and sensors. Developed electromechanical systems including a Mini CNC Plotter and a 4-axis robotic arm using NEMA17 stepper motors, ULN2003, and TMC drivers for precision control.

Led deep learning research for Alzheimer's disease detection, analyzing MRI data to classify dementia stages. Implemented CNNs, VGG16, Vision Transformers (ViT) achieving 95.10% accuracy with ViT. Applied advanced neural network architectures strengthening expertise in AI-driven medical diagnostics.

projects.title: EcoFarm - Smart Agriculture System
projects.description: Led a team to design and build an IoT-based smart farming system. Designed custom PCB tested with over 10,000 readings. Built a real-time crop prediction model using incremental learning that updates continuously without system downtime. Created and deployed an AI chatbot for farming advice.

projects.title: CDIB - Cancer Detection In Blood
projects.description: Built a CNN model for leukemia detection from blood cell images, achieving 98.53% test accuracy. Reduced model size by 83% through quantization without losing accuracy. Reached 100% recall in detecting myeloblasts. Used MLOps with MLflow for tracking and deployed a FastAPI service in Docker.

projects.title: TikGuard - Content Moderation for Kids
projects.description: Developed a transformer-based deep learning solution for detecting unsuitable TikTok content for children, achieving 86.7% accuracy on the custom TikHarm dataset. Demonstrates significant advancements in video content moderation for safer online experiences.

projects.title: Parkinson's Disease Diagnosis via Speech
projects.description: Achieved state-of-the-art RÂ² score of 99.9% on the Motor Test and 99.6% on the Total Test by integrating Clustering Feature Selection with Extra Trees Regressor. Leveraged advanced feature extraction and regression techniques for enhanced diagnostic accuracy.

projects.title: EEG Eye State Detection
projects.description: Analyzed EEG data from the Emotiv EEG Neuroheadset to classify eye states (open/closed). Performed EDA, feature correlation analysis, and outlier detection. Trained and evaluated multiple ML models, selecting K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) achieving 96.26% accuracy. Deployed using FastAPI and Prometheus.

projects.title: Alzheimer's Disease Detection via MRI
projects.description: Led deep learning research for Alzheimer's disease detection, analyzing MRI data to classify dementia stages. Implemented CNNs, VGG16, and Vision Transformers (ViT) achieving 95.10% accuracy with ViT. Applied advanced neural network architectures for AI-driven medical diagnostics.

contact.heading: Get In Touch
